name: HouseShayla
_source: s;Shayla;Maybe they left a note, or...{w} wait.{w} This is...{w} my training lance?{w}{clear}...{w}{c:expression;Shayla;CloseEyes} Crap, I remember now...{w} Was that really just earlier today...?
s;SShayla;Shut UP, sis!{w} Give me that back!
#Sister runs from off-screen left to off-screen right. Shayla follows
s;ShaylaMother;This again?{w} What is it now, you two?
#	//They run across again. Then, as Sister runs across a third time, Shayla intercepts her on the right side of the screen
s;ShaylaMother;Shayla.{w} What was it this time?
s;SShayla;...{w} Fine! Take it, for all I care.|It was a piece of junk, anyway.
s;ShaylaMother;Seriously?{w} Another broken lance!?|These things don't grow on trees, you know!|I paid good coin for this!
s;SShayla;What!?{w} What do you want me to say!?{w}{clear}I'm sorry I broke your crappy lance just like all the other crappy lances.
s;ShaylaMother;Damn it, Shay!{w} It's always the same thing with you!{w}{clear}Never thinking before you act, always running your mouth!|If your father could see you-!
s;SShayla;Stop it!{w} He has nothing to do with this!
s;ShaylaMother;If he were still around, maybe he would've taught you some discipline.{w}{clear}At this rate, you'll never even be half the warrior he was...

s;SShayla;J-just...{w} just shut up!! Shut up about Dad, and shut up about your stupid discipline!|You have no idea how disciplined I really am!{w} I only broke the lance because I was trying so hard!
s;ShaylaMother;You only broke it because you weren't trying hard enough!
s;SShayla;Y-you-!{w} I...|I-I hate you!{w} I hate both of you!|Take your stupid lance and choke on it!
s;Shayla;I really said all that...{c:expression;Shayla;HalfCloseEyes}{w} over a stupid lance?{w}{clear}Who the hell cares?{w} Jeez...
s;Shayla;I...{w} I hope they're...{w}{clear}I-I mean, if those were the last words I ever got to...

s;Shayla;Nah, I'm not even gonna think about that.{w} Just gonna have to go find them.{w}{clear}Hmmm...{w} {c:expression;Shayla;Smile}you know, even broken, this hunk of junk could have a real nasty swing...|'s gotta be better than leaving here empty-handed.
update_achievement;1;No Last Word;Viewed Shayla's Flashback in Ch1.
